name: Iron Sphere
movement: burrow 10 ft., climb 20 ft., walk 30 ft.
description: The Iron Sphere is a small, sturdy construct with an ability to deal damage in combat and manipulate environments, characterized by its robust physical form and mechanical design.
memorable: It excels in destroying objects and structures, thanks to its double damage against them and burrowing capabilities.
goals: To engage enemies in combat and destroy barriers or structures.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other constructs or as creations of a skilled artisan.
environment: Usually found in areas with fortifications, ruins, or places with solid rock.
strengths: Immune to several damage types, high Constitution, and capable of burrowing.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma, limiting its effectiveness in magical and social interactions.
attacks: Makes three different melee attacks (Blade, Piston, Spike) and has a powerful Lightning Cannon attack.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Cannon, dealing significant lightning damage in a line with a recharge requirement.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without sight.
skills: Skilled in athletics and has decent perception capabilities.
additional_information: Immune to changing forms due to Immutable Form ability.
Can leap impressively high and far with Standing Leap.
Burrows through solid rock, leaving a tunnel behind.
Has resistances to multiple damage types.
Active in combat and environmental destruction.
test_queries: small construct with melee attacks and burrowing
resilient construct that deals double damage to structures
tactical burrowing creature with lightning powers
mechanical monster that excels in combat and tunneling
versatile construct immune to many damage types
